translation: Of the strong, I am the strength devoid of desire and attachment, and in all beings, I am the desire in accordance with Dharma, O Arjuna.
commentary: 7.11 strength strength? of the strong? Asmi am (I)? devoid of desire and attachment? Dharmaviruddhah unopposed to Dharma? in beings in beings? Kamaá¸¥ desire? Asmi am (I)? Bharatarshabha O Lord of the Bharatas.Commentary Kama Desire for those objects that come in contact with the senses.Raga attachment for those objects that come in contact with the senses.I am that strength which is necessary
